Comment: Every single voter in 2024 had lived through Trump's first term. That alone, and the manner it ended, should have been evidence enough not to vote for him again. His chaos makes his lie more transparent than the fact checking he detests. Yet people seem to have forgotten he lies four times more than everyone’s stereotype of a politician, and forgotten the chaos to vote for him again in spite of options in the primaries and the general election. Voters bear responsibility for this.
